entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY, Old Crow
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:02 p.m. MST Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Blowing snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Blowing snow. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Blowing snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Blowing snow. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Local blowing snow. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 22 April 2023
